name: Balls of Steel
description:
The Balls are Back! The legendary 90s pinball game Balls of Steel returns to PC in all of its radical retro glory. Play through 5 classic top-down pinball tables: Darkside, Barbarian, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island. Not only that, we've added two BRAND NEW tables in classic BoS Style: Centipede, and Missile Command! Get 7 awesome retro tables in one package!

Features:


  • Enjoy 5 Classic BoS tables: Barbarian, Darkside, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island, rebuilt to run on modern PC hardware!
  • Play 2 brand-new Atari-themed tables: Centipede and Missile Command. Enjoy the retro ambience while you fight back bugs and waves of incoming missiles.
  • Keyboard, gamepad, or mouse controls let you play the way you want.
